clinical_study.brief_title: Buteyko Based Remedial Breathing Therapy With Children With Asthma

lead_sponsor.agency: ARCIM Institute Academic Research in Complementary and Integrative Medicine

clinical_study.source: ARCIM Institute Academic Research in Complementary and Integrative Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized, controlled trial to investigate the effects of a buteyko based remedial breathing therapy on children with asthma regarding to their symptoms, use of medication and lung function tests.

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction of Betamimetics (-30%) at 3- and/or 6-month follow up
primary_outcome.time_frame: asthmaspezific parameters are measured before and after intervention as well as 3- and 6- month follow up

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- signed informed consent of the parents
- age 6- 15 years
- information and consent of the consulting doctor
- levels of asthma therapy 1-3
Exclusion Criteria:
- participation in another study
